'Peter Mensah (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Ghana na-England na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Tears of the Sun, Hidalgo, 300, na usoro telivishọn dịka Starz Spartacus: Blood and Sand, Spartacus: Gods of the Arena, na Spartacus: Vengeance
A mụrụ Mensah na Chiraa, Ghana, ma si n'ezinụlọ agụmakwụkwọ

A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna ya sitere na mpaghara Brong Ahafo, wee kwaga Hertfordshire, England, ya na nna ya, Peter Osei Mensah, onye injinia, nne ya, onye edemede, na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya mgbe ọ dị obere. Mensah malitere ịme nka ọgụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii.
Ihe nkiri Mensah gụnyere Avatar, 300, Hidalgo, Tears of the Sun, Jason X, Harvard Man, Bless the Child na The Incredible Hulk
Ọ na-esokwa na obere ihe nkiri The Seed, nke DJ Joe Hahn nke Linkin Park mepụtara ma duzie
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na Star Trek: Enterprise, Tracker, Witchblade, Blue Murder, Relic Hunter, Earth: Final Conflict, Highlander: The Raven, na La Femme Nikita
Ọ bụ onye otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro A&E Network A Nero Wolfe Mystery na Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles
O mere olu na ọdịdị nke Sgt
Zach Hammond na egwuregwu vidio EA Dead Space
Mensah mere Oenomaus na Spartacus ma nọrọ na Spartacus Panel na Comic Con afọ 2009 na 2011
O nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na oge nke ise nke True Blood
Ọ bụ olu Predaking, onye ndu yiri dragọn nke Predacons na Transformers: Prime
